title: (x) The Apex Theory logo - Solstice {Stephen}
content:
Can anyone ID the typeface used in the apex theory logo?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314123313im_/http:/typophile.com/files/apex_logo.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Felcher Fox & Litner P.C letterhead - Sackers Gothic {Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314123313/http:/typophile.com/node/18677 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) 1960s poster casual script - hand lettered {Stephen} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080314123313/http:/typophile.com/node/18669 "Go to next forum topic")
author: megatron5150

comments.content: Thank you for the quick ID!
It’s a T-26 font? I thought surely it was something from Emigre! it just has that funky Emigre look, you know.
